name: Use QUALIFIED data structures (RPG400)
description: This rule searches for all RPG400 artefact not using QUALIFIED data structures.
output:
This report lists RPG400 artefact not using QUALIFIED data structures.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Artifact full name
rationale: Qualified data structures allow you to use the same field name in multiple structures without name conflict, provide a means of defining standard structures (the most obvious use of this is for APIs), and they lead to self documenting code.
remediation: Try to use the QUALIFIED data structures in the RPG400 programs.
remediationSample:
D Phone           DS                  Qualified
D  CountryCode                   5    Varying
D  NDDPrefix                     5    Varying
D  AreaCode                      5    Varying
D  Number                        9    Varying
D  Extension                     4    Varying
D  IDDPrefix                     5    Varying Dim(5)
